import React from 'react' import './App.scss'; import $ from "jquery"; import Intro from "./Intro.js"; import Navbar from './Navbar.js' import TalentModule from './common-components/TalentModule.js' import Video from './common-components/Video.js' import Ad from './common-components/Ad.js' import IntroSubcopy from './IntroSubcopy.js' import MiniAd from './MiniAd.js' import Anchors from './Anchors.js' class App extends React.Component { componentDidMount() { var hash = window.location.hash; if (hash !== '') { setTimeout(() => { const id = hash.replace('#', ''); const element = document.getElementById(id); if (element) element.scrollIntoView({block:"center", behavior:"smooth"}); }, 0); } } render() { var beeCollection = ["https://furthermore-cdn.equinox.com/source-of-strength/static/media/LM_Q1.png", "https://furthermore-cdn.equinox.com/source-of-strength/static/media/LM_Q2.png", "https://furthermore-cdn.equinox.com/source-of-strength/static/media/LM_Q3.png", "https://furthermore-cdn.equinox.com/source-of-strength/static/media/LM_Q4.png"], beeTextCollection = ["“With our self-care, we are creating the conditions for our most awakened self to arise.”", "“My whole routine is really based on making it ritualistic.”", "“If I don't take care of the self then who will, right?”", "“My skin care goals are hydration and protecting my skin from irritations and to glow from the inside out.”" ], joshCollection = ["https://furthermore-cdn.equinox.com/source-of-strength/static/media/LM_Q1.png", "https://furthermore-cdn.equinox.com/source-of-strength/static/media/LM_Q2.png", "https://furthermore-cdn.equinox.com/source-of-strength/static/media/LM_Q3.png", "https://furthermore-cdn.equinox.com/source-of-strength/static/media/LM_Q4.png"], joshTextCollection = [ "“The self-care routine for me is striking a balance between work, play, travel, friendships, family, and relationships.”", "“I use a moisturizer and eye cream immediately after I get out of the shower.”", "“If you're doing self-care and wellness for mind/body/spirit, why not do it for your face?”", "“I’m typically looking for something that allows oil control, a great moisturizer, and a protectant from the elements.”"], danielleCollection = ["https://furthermore-cdn.equinox.com/source-of-strength/static/media/LM_Q1.png", "https://furthermore-cdn.equinox.com/source-of-strength/static/media/LM_Q3.png", "https://furthermore-cdn.equinox.com/source-of-strength/static/media/LM_Q4.png"], danielleTextCollection = [ "“When I get everything squared away I feel more prepared and more relaxed.”", "“It helps me in all areas of my life—with training, with professionalism, with jobs, with interviews, with photo shoots, anything.”", "“I talked to dermatologists and they gave me a couple of different products that really helped improve my skin and helped it glow.”" ]; return (
) } } export default App
